about_the_game:
The Lone Grove

The Lone Grove is a short experience, about a boy who, after the death of his father, discovers in his belongings records of a forest where his father used to camp. He decides to go to the place to try to connect with the memories of the father with whom he never had a very good relationship. There he will find memories, records and mysteries to solve.

It's a game about exploration, memories, puzzles and a beautiful place see.

Explore a Vast Scenery:


Explore a big scenario carefully constructed with a lot of interesting points and mysteries do find.

Solve Puzzles:

Figure it out how to solve all puzzles.

Survive The Night:

Stay in the light, collect resources and be careful.

Find memories:

Keep an eye open for collectables, they may hold answers to mysteries.

short_description: After his father's death, a young man discovers records of a forest where his father used to camp. In search of connection and understanding, he decides to explore the area. Among the ancient trees, he uncovers forgotten memories and mysteries to unravel.
